author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chew's Group ‍Co To Sell All Of Issued And Paid-Up Shares In Capital Of CAPL, CESPL, CGIPL And CGMPL
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Chew’s Group Ltd:
* ‍CO TO SELL ALL OF ISSUED AND PAID-UP SHARES IN CAPITAL OF CAPL, CESPL, CGIPL AND CGMPL TO HL PLUS​
* ‍DEAL FOR S$11 MILLION * ‍PROPOSED DISPOSAL EXPECTED TO RESULT IN A LOSS OF APPROXIMATELY S$1.4 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
